ComicInfo.Summary:
One agent's confession brings the B.P.R.D. closer to finding the cult leader enslaving followers from across the country, and dissent within Varvaras ranks leaves cracks in her plans for a new Pandemonium.
Hellboy rejoins the B.P.R.D. after 17 years away!
